text.section: There is an Innovations in Aging Services Advisory Council in the Department.
The Secretary is the chair of the Council.

section.section: The term of a member of the Council is 4 years.
The terms of the members appointed by the Secretary are staggered as required by the terms provided for members of the Council on October 1, 2007.
At the end of a term, a member continues to serve until a successor is appointed and qualifies.
A member who is appointed after a term has begun serves only for the rest of the term and until a successor is appointed and qualifies.
